name: EOS Innovazioni, a.s.
membership:
National Union of Employers: www.ruzsr.sk
Investment Support Association: www.isa-association.sk
goal: EOS Innovazioni a.s. helps its clients to grow by providing consultancy services in the area of public funding for financing of their projects, in particular in energy, environment, research, development and innovation and transport sector. EOS Innovazioni a.s. advises clients on preparing project proposals, budget planning, project management and implementation. Our services further cover EU policy monitoring, intelligence gathering and dialogue with stakeholders.
interests: Budget, Culture, Development, Energy, Environment, Humanitarian Aid, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives: Cohesion Policy, Horizon 2020, Energy Policy, Transport Policy, Environmental Policy
